about_the_game:
The Gamblers campaign was jointly developed by Baltic Dragon and John ‘Rain’ Waters, a former Viper Demo Team pilot, member of the 77th Fighter Squadron and host of the Afterburn Podcast.

Throughout the 13 missions of the campaign, the player will have an opportunity to relive some of the sorties that Rain and his squadron mates flew during their deployment to Syria as part of Operation Inherent Resolve. Furthermore, the campaign recreates the most iconic moments of the allied involvement within the theater, including the Battle of Raqqa in 2017, the US TLAM strike against the Shayrat Airbase in retaliation for the regime’s chemical attack on Aleppo and the standoff between US forces and the notorious Russian Wagner group, which is now known as the “Battle of Khasham”.

This campaign also introduces a new, more immersive way for the player to interact with the environment using their HOTAS, this practically completely eliminates the use of space bar or F-10 menu.

The campaign also includes features that account for the player’s performance and possible errors. This means that his wingmen or other assets in the mission can take over tasks the player is struggling with, which can lead to multiple ways in which each mission can progress. All of these scenarios were meticulously checked and tested to avoid possible bugs and problems and ensure an enjoyable player experience.

Key Features:
  • 13 immersive missions with a variety of different tasks: CAS, X-CAS, SEAD, DEAD, escort, pre-planned strikes and more
  • An interactive intro mission, voiced by John ‘Rain’ Waters, guiding the player through the most important aspects of the campaign
  • Over 3000 lines of dialogue with voice-overs
  • Custom ATC interaction for all the missions
  • Optional use of air to air refueling or the choice to skip it all together
  • Detailed documentation, flight plans, maps, target information available in both PDF format and from within each mission as part of the kneeboard
  • Detailed skins for the Gamblers created by Thomas 'Roughmaster' Vercauteren

Localization:
Voiceovers: English
Briefings/Subtitles: English

Requirements:
  • DCS: F-16C Viper
  • DCS: Syria Map by Ugra Media
detailed_description:
The Gamblers campaign was jointly developed by Baltic Dragon and John ‘Rain’ Waters, a former Viper Demo Team pilot, member of the 77th Fighter Squadron and host of the Afterburn Podcast.

Throughout the 13 missions of the campaign, the player will have an opportunity to relive some of the sorties that Rain and his squadron mates flew during their deployment to Syria as part of Operation Inherent Resolve. This campaign also introduces a new, more immersive way for the player to interact with the environment using their HOTAS, this practically completely eliminates the use of space bar or F-10 menu.

The campaign also includes features that account for the player’s performance and possible errors.   • Detailed documentation, flight plans, maps, target information available in both PDF format and from within each mission as part of the kneeboard
  • Detailed skins for the Gamblers created by Thomas 'Roughmaster' Vercauteren

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS *: Windows 8, 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 2 cores or more
  • RAM: 8GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 4GB+
  • Input: Joystick
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS *: Windows 8, 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 4.5Ghz+ with 6 cores or more
  • RAM: 32GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 8GB+
  • Input: Joystick and Pedals
